title: Ping fixing
body: In the middle east our ping are at least 120 and its not optimal how can i make it better.

replies.body: Our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help tune up unstable connections or how you're routing to the game server.  Keep in mind though, while we can troubleshoot speed, physical distance away from the region is not something that can be exceeded.
Ok,is there any case where we can have a server that is close to the middle east and what might be the optimal server for me to join to get optimal ping.
